message: This totally isn't a big deal, and perhaps intentional, but wanted to point out in case it wasn't. When you view a group in which you're not a member, your profile shows up on the side (e.g., "1 member online now" displays you).
Not a member, but viewing. I'd suspect it wouldn't show to anyone else, which is why I found it a tad odd to show you as a member when you aren't. Maybe to help you visualize being a part of a group?
I've wondered if that was only visible to you (the non-member) and not other 'real' members
@michaelschade if you're not a member of https://convore.com/sandbox/ how about visiting that group and I'll tell you if you're visible...
And sorry, not trying to be picky :)
@michaelschade You need to visualise and believe before you deserve to join :)
